title: Disable 2-step verification
error_disable: Error while disabling 2-step verification (your security keys were removed)
error_deletesecuritykeys: Error while deleting the security keys
paragraph1: Are you sure you want to disable 2-step verification?
paragraph2: 2-step verification offers extra seucurity to your account. If you disable 2-step verification all your security keys will be unlinked from this account and we will not request you any verification code while signing in.
paragraph3: If, after thinking about it twice, you still want to, enter your password and click the red button.
